bibl.title: Evidence from the Baboon Catacomb in North Saqqara for a West Mediterranean Monkey Trade Route to Ptolemaic Alexandria. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Evidence for a monkey trade route from Carthage to Alexandria between 202 B.C. (defeat of Hannibal at Zama) and 146 B.C. (destruction of Carthage).
bibl.seg: GOUDSMIT Jaap and Douglas BRANDON-JONES, Evidence from the Baboon Catacomb in North Saqqara for a West Mediterranean Monkey Trade Route to Ptolemaic Alexandria. Avec résumé en anglais.
